participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and adventurous, he enjoys sharing his experiences and learning from others.
participant_1.background: My favorite vacation was when my wife and I went to the Galapagos Islands. My family is an important part of my life. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with myself. I collect vintage cars. I am a scientist.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Playful and introspective, she often reflects on her experiences and has a quirky sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I don't mind the hot weather, but it's hard to keep my hair from frizzing. I'm most afraid of people finding out about my weird habit of smelling my own farts. I have been struggling to find a way to explain my vegetarian diet to my girlfriend. I watched my niece swim last year and thought she looked so free. my name is mary and i am from colorado.

content.text: Hi Mary, how are you today?
Fine, thank you.  I'm from Colorado.  Where are you from?
I'm from California.  I'm a scientist and I collect vintage cars.  My wife and I went to the Galapagos Islands for vacation last year and it was amazing!

That sounds like a wonderful vacation!  I've always wanted to go to the Galapagos Islands.  I'm not sure if I'm ready for a vegetarian diet, but I've been thinking about it.  I was watching my niece swim last year and she looked so free.

It was amazing!  We saw so many different animals and plants.  I've never seen so many blue footed boobies in one place!  I think you should try a vegetarian diet.  It's really good for you and it's better for the environment.  I have a friend who is a vegetarian and he loves it.
I know it would be good for me, but I'm not sure if I could give up meat.  I love bacon too much!
You could always try a meatless Monday to see how you like it.  I'm sure you'll get used to it.  Plus, there are so many delicious vegetarian dishes out there.
I'll give it a try.  Thanks for the suggestion
